details.title: 105: Never Let Me Go
details.actor: Warren Christie/Laura Mennell/Azita Ghanizada/David Strathairn/Ryan Cartwright/Malik Yoba/Erin Way/Mahershala Ali
details.overview: Rachel goes on a date that ends with a powerful kiss; Rosen's team officially joins the Defense Criminal Investigation Service, and their first case is to probe a series of deaths linked to a high school in Pennsylvania.
